about_the_game:
Buckle up for the most intense survival experience as you face the wrath of the worst hurricane in history. Inspired by games like The Long Dark and Firewatch. Your journey will begin amidst the chaos of the hurricane, and your struggle for survival extends far beyond the storm's fury. Brace yourself for an open-world adventure where scavengers and aggressive wildlife lurk around every corner, challenging you to endure, adapt, and conquer the aftermath.

Explore a vast, dynamic open world filled with the echoes of a once thriving civilization. You are constantly striving for survival, elated at every meal, and thrilled with every sunrise. Uncover hidden locations, encounter other survivors with their own stories, and discover the secrets buried beneath the rubble of the old world. Traverse diverse biomes, each with its own unique set of dangers and opportunities.

Choose story mode or survival mode for two completely different experiences. Get engrossed in a thought provoking story or just simply survive as long as possible. How many days can you last?

Scavenge, gather, craft or trade essential tools and weapons to navigate the dangers that lie between you and surviving. From improvised shelters to essential supplies, every crafting choice is a step closer to mastering the art of survival. No inventory sorting. All your stuff is sorted automatically so you don't have to waste your time flipping through pages of UI.

Encounter dangerous wildlife, other survivors, and desperate scavengers as you traverse the hazardous landscape. Gain XP that unlocks character upgrades and search for crucial supplies from every encounter. Everyone is fighting it out for the same resources.

Balance your basic needs – food, water, and shelter – while managing resources for the arduous journey ahead. Make strategic decisions that could mean the difference between life and death. Can't find what you need to survive? Trade anything you find of value with the merchant. That includes things like jewelry, cigarettes, and even toilet paper. Things that were once taken for granted are much more valuable after the storm hits. Also no chopping down trees! That has been done enough in other games and kills the immersion. Honestly who chops down a whole tree with an axe in 3 swings? You can however chop fallen logs. 

It's a dangerous lonely world. Your character can suffer from not only physical ailments such as broken bones and the flu virus, but also mental health issues like depression and anxiety, depending on the choices you make.

The storm has scattered families and shattered lives. You're over 100 miles away from your loved ones, and every step toward them is a step into the unknown. Navigate treacherous landscapes, overcome obstacles, and brave the remnants of a world torn apart. When you play on story mode, experience a gripping narrative as you navigate the emotional challenges of survival, not just for yourself but for the family waiting at the end of your journey. Every discovery, every setback, and every triumph is a chapter in your unique story.

Are you ready to confront the aftermath of a Category 6 hurricane, where survival is not just a personal challenge but a battle against the elements, scavengers, and dangerous wildlife? The storm has come, and only the resilient will prevail. Can you weather the havoc and emerge as the master of this new, chaotic world? The journey into the heart of the storm awaits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400, AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060, AMD RX 5700 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Brace yourself for the ultimate open-world survival craft experience. Welcome to a world shattered by the relentless fury of the most colossal hurricane in history. Explore and gather resources for survival and crafting. Fight off aggressive wild life and scavengers. Play story mode or survival mode
